task.summary: Default task

Added first test to insert a single valid coin using unitils to mock results. Also did some refactoring on names of classes. Wanted the Bank interface to feel more like it could be used for any type of bank. Also changed BankImpl Class to VendingMachineBank mostly because I think it is a better description.

Refactored how I am testing and setting up the overall structure of this project. I created a VendingMachine class that will do all of the high level customer interactions and will use methods from classes like VendingMachineBank. I think this makes more sense because now all of my mocked out testing will be done in VendingMachineTest for all of the services that the VendingMachine class uses and later after I have every underlying service built out for VendingMachine I will start implementing the underlying services with their own test files.
Changed my mocking library from unitils to mockito. After discovering the mockito library I found that I liked the syntax and dependency injection capabilities more than unitils.
Added test for multiple valid coins being added into the vending machine

Removed Bank Interface. Decided not to do anything with Interfaces in this kata. At least not for now. Added ButtonPanel, Product, Screen, and Transaction classes. The transaction class handles current transactions as a buffer to the bank which takes the money at time of product selection so that the money in the transaction is not committed to the bank until transaction is finalized. Screen will now hold the text display of the vending machine instead of the display being returned every time a coin is inserted.
Modified getDisplay in Screen class to reset display back to INSERT COIN after the current display is requested.
Added test to verify that when insufficient funds are present for a product that the screen displays PRICE and the money is not deposited into the bank

I misread some of the requirements around how the screen should act after selecting a product with insufficient funds. Corrected the misunderstanding and also I missed clearing the transaction total after purchasing a product. This has also been corrected.
Added case for when more money than is needed for a purchase is inserted and the extra money is returned to the Coin Return
Went back and added the ability to return coin when an invalid coin is inserted.
Added case for when a product is selected that is sold out. Screen will display sold out and then the current transaction total.
Accidently skipped for the coin return button requirement. Added case for pressing the coin return to empty transaction total into the coin return.
Added case for when a selected product is sold out and no money is inserted in the machine so the display shows SOLD OUT and then INSERT COIN

Added new class inventory that will keep track of products in stock. Added method which sets a default message for vending machine based on if the bank can make change or not for any given product. Not completely baked yet though.
Added test for updating the state of whether or not the vending machine requires exact change after a customer inserts additional coins

Refactored the project to use Coin objects instead of double values. Coins have mass, diameter, and value. Coins that are valid to the vending machine are defined in the ValidCoins class. Theoretically ValidCoins could be modified to read in the specifications of valid coins from a text file or from a database such that the valid coins could be updated periodically or for any vending machine.
Added more tests for determineCoinValue method
updating the total of a transaction tests added
test case added to verify clearing of transaction total

Wanted the Bank interface to feel more like it could be used for any type of bank. Also changed BankImpl Class to VendingMachineBank mostly because I think it is a better description.

I created a VendingMachine class that will do all of the high level customer interactions and will use methods from classes like VendingMachineBank. I think this makes more sense because now all of my mocked out testing will be done in VendingMachineTest for all of the services that the VendingMachine class uses and later after I have every underlying service built out for VendingMachine I will start implementing the underlying services with their own test files.

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: test case added to verify clearing of transaction total
